description: This file defines a React component 'PreferencesPill' used to display user preferences related to university, stream, and college, with loading state handling and navigation to a preferences page.

methods.name: nameById
methods.description: Utility generic function to find the name of an item by its ID from a list of objects with 'id' and 'name' properties.

methods.name: PreferencesPill
methods.description: React functional component that displays user preferences or a loading indicator.
